error.create: Unable to create the resource. Please try again.
error.delete: Failed to delete the resource. Please check and try again.
error.update: Unable to update the resource. Please try again.
error.retrieve: Could not retrieve the resource. Please verify and retry.
error.auth: Authentication failed. Please verify your credentials.
error.permission: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
error.timeout: The request timed out. Please check your connection and try again.
error.validation: Validation error. Please ensure all required fields are correct.
error.server: A server issue occurred. Please try again later.
error.network: Network error detected. Please verify your internet connection.
error.dependency: Missing or unavailable dependent resource. Please check and retry.
error.conflict: Conflict detected: The resource {resource} might already exist.
error.quota: Quota exceeded. Please upgrade your plan to continue.
error.storage: Not enough storage space available. Free up some space to proceed.
error.format: Invalid file format. Use one of the supported formats.
error.limit: The request exceeds the allowed limit. Please adjust and retry.
error.connection: Lost connection to the server. Please reconnect and try again.
error.invalid: The provided '{data}' is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support for assistance.

success.auth: Welcome back! You’ve been authenticated successfully.
success.permission: Permission granted! You can now proceed.
success.process: The process has been completed successfully.
success.download: Your file has been downloaded successfully.
success.save: All changes have been saved successfully.
success.reset: Settings have been reset to default successfully.
success.logout: You’ve been logged out. See you soon!
success.share: The resource has been shared successfully.

warning.create: Resource creation may not complete due to missing elements.
warning.delete: Dependencies might still exist. Please verify before proceeding.
warning.update: Updating this resource might overwrite existing changes.
warning.retrieve: The retrieved data may be incomplete or outdated.
warning.auth: Authentication will expire soon. Please reauthenticate.
warning.permission: Current permission levels might be insufficient for advanced actions.
warning.timeout: The operation is taking longer than expected. Please wait or retry.
warning.deprecated: This feature is deprecated and may be removed in future updates.
warning.incomplete: Operation incomplete. Additional steps may be needed.
warning.overwriting: This action will overwrite existing data. Proceed with caution.
warning.retry: The operation failed but can be retried.
warning.storage: Storage space is running low. Please free up some space.
warning.quota: You are nearing your usage quota. Consider upgrading your plan.
warning.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Save them before exiting.
warning.duplicate: A similar resource already exists. Please review before proceeding.
warning.unverified: This action requires verification. Please complete the verification process.

info.auth: Authentication is in progress. Please wait...
info.permission: Checking permissions for the requested action. Please wait...
info.process: The process is running. Please hold on.
info.share: Preparing resource for sharing. Please wait...
info.reconnect: Reconnecting to the server. Please wait...

critical.system: A critical system error occurred. Immediate attention required.
critical.data_loss: Potential data loss detected. Please back up your data immediately.
critical.security: A critical security issue was detected. Update your credentials immediately.
critical.breach: Data breach detected. Secure your account immediately.
critical.shutdown: System is shutting down due to an unrecoverable error.
critical.failure: Critical failure encountered. Contact support immediately.
critical.integrity: Data integrity check failed. Action required.
critical.malware: Potential malware detected. Run a security scan immediately.

confirm.default: Are you sure you want to proceed?
confirm.create: Are you sure you want to create this?
confirm.update: Are you sure you want to make this update?
confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
confirm.reset: Are you sure you want to reset this to default?
confirm.overwrite: This will overwrite the existing data. Do you want to continue?
confirm.discard: This will discard the changes. Are you sure?
confirm.exit: Are you sure you want to exit?
confirm.back: Are you sure you want to go back?

auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in {seconds} seconds.
auth.password_reset: Your password has been reset successfully.
auth.password_change: Your password has been changed successfully.
auth.logout: You have been logged out successfully.
auth.email_verification: Email verification link has been sent.
auth.email_verified: Your email has been verified successfully.
